traits.Magic Resistance: The chaos quadrapod has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.Multiattack: The chaos quadrapod makes up to two tentacle attacks.
actions.Tentacle: Melee Weapon Attack: +6+1d4 + 4 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled (escape DC 14+1d4 + 12). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained. The chaos quadrapod can grapple no more than two targets at a time.
actions.Chaos Cloud (Recharges after a Short or: The chaos quadrapod shoots forth a knot of roiling ethereal light that explodes at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must succeed on a DC 14+1d4 + 12 Charisma saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.
